item.title: How to bring 'boring' industries to life with Ayo Abbas and Michelle Garrett
item.description: This episode is repurposed from my guest appearance on Michelle Garrett's PR Explored show live on LinkedIn. The lively discussion talks about marketing and PR strategies for so-called "boring" industries. We talk about how to find compelling stories in B2B sectors like construction, engineering, and manufacturing, and why these industries offer a sea of potential riches for marketers willing to dig that bit deeper... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/built-environment-marketing/

item.title: Jonah Lobe Interview
item.description:
Welcome back pop culture nerds! On this episode our hosts (plus Nate) welcome creator Jonah Lobe! Jonah's impressive career includes time working on multiple Fallout titles, Marvel Anatomy, and his very on comic series Quiet Level One! Be sure to download this episode to hear more about Jonah's career and how he got started!


All music written and performed by Chris Lott. Follow us on:
